YOUR_DETAILS.TITLE: Your Details
YOUR_DETAILS.SUBTITLE: Enter your first name, last name, and phone number to begin.

USERNAME_EMAIL.TITLE: Username & Email
USERNAME_EMAIL.SUBTITLE: We've created a username for youâ€”you can keep it or change it. Please add your email address as well.

CREATE_PASSWORD.TITLE: Protect Your Account
CREATE_PASSWORD.SUBTITLE: Set a strong password and confirm it. Agree to the terms to finish your registration.

VALIDATION.ACCEPT_TERMS: You must accept the terms and conditions
VALIDATION.NAME_PATTERN: Name can only contain letters and spaces
VALIDATION.EMAIL_INVALID: Please enter a valid email address
VALIDATION.USERNAME_PATTERN: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_MIN_LENGTH: Password must be at least {{length}} characters
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_PATTERN: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (!@#$%^&*)

VERIFY_CODE.TITLE: Verification Code
VERIFY_CODE.SUBTITLE: We've sent a 4-digit code to your phone number ending in 0115. Please enter it below.
VERIFY_CODE.OTP_SEND_FAILED: Failed to send OTP, please try again
VERIFY_CODE.MAX_ATTEMPTS_REACHED: Maximum attempts reached, please request a new OTP
VERIFY_CODE.VERIFICATION_ERROR: An error occurred while verifying the OTP, please try again
